Add a touch of luxury to your home with their hand-made roman blinds. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why not only is this roman hand-made by an expert team, but it also comes with a free five year warranty, for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Venice Silver Grey Roman Blind
products.description: Venice is a plush velvet-like fabric in luxury neutral shades. Product id: db-rom0887 fabric colour: silver grey material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets. Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes venice silver grey roman blind in grey.

products.title: Urban Metallic Silver Roman Blind
products.description: Urban comes in several modern grey and cream shades, this hopsack range adds modern simplicity to your kitchen or bedroom. Urban tales on a metallic appearance the light hits the fabric, adding more depth to this textured fabric. On the lighter end of the grey spectrum, urban silver allows the addition of a soft grey-toned fabric without being too dark or over-bearing. Perfect for retaining a light and airy theme whilst adding some colour.

products.title: Malta Charcoal Roman Blind
products.description: Malta is one of their most popular fabric collections. Malta charcoal is a dark, statement grey shade. An elegant hue that will work well with modern grey interiors. Grey is a stylish choice, and a trend that's not looking to go anywhere just yet. This fabric is beautiful for living rooms, dining rooms or bedrooms. Their made to measure roman blinds are all handmade within the uk and will provide a touch of luxury to your interior styling.

products.title: Faux Suede Denim Roman Blind
products.description: Their faux suede range of fabric has proven to be one of their most popular roman blinds and curtains for many years. Still, at the forefront of fashion, the fabric makes sumptuous roman blinds and curtains. The faux suede denim roman blind in a lovely blue colour is an excellent way to transform your home at an affordable price. Product id: db-rom0008 fabric colour: denim material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Joyford Tweed Grey Roman Blind
products.description: An affordable textured weave fabric, their joyford range comes in a few neutral grey tones. Great for minimalist homes or to add an earthy finish to your room. Charcoal greys and slate blacks looks great with this tweed grey fabric, pair with lighter paintwork and accessories for a modern look. Product id: db-rom0975 fabric colour: tweed grey material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Faux Suede Cream Roman Blind
products.description: Simple yet stylish the cream faux suede roman blind is the perfect finish for both the traditional & contemporary interiors. Their faux suede collection comes in a variety of colours which complement various styles of home decoration. Its a perfect solution to creating a comfy space for you to relax in. The faux suede is soft to the touch, and is incredibly pleasing to the eye. All their blinds are made to measure right here in their west yorkshire factory.

products.title: Faux Suede Barley Roman Blind
products.description: Capture the perfect finish to your windows with this fantastic faux suede roman blind. Their faux suede deluxe range of fabric has proven to be one of their most popular roman blinds and curtains for many years. Still, at the forefront of fashion, this fabric makes sumptuous roman blinds and curtains to enhance your home interior. The faux suede barley roman blind is a lovely cream colour and is an excellent way to enhance your home at an affordable price.

products.title: Faux Suede Deluxe Black Roman Blind
products.description: Simple yet stylish the black faux suede roman blind is the perfect finish for both the modern contemporaryhome. Their faux suede collection comes in a variety of colours which include pinks, naturals and tones of colour which are highly sought after in todays interiors. All their blinds are made to measure to your measurements right here in west yorkshire. Their skilled seamstresses hold a wealth of experience, so you can be assured that a quality roman blind will be manufactured and delivered to you.

products.title: Faux Suede Mercury Roman Blind
products.description: This classic grey roman blind has an attractive suede finish and will add a stylish and elegant feel to any room in your home. Our luxury side control chain headrail system allows quick and easy installation. Combine with contrasting curtains or simply use it on its own for a perfect crisp finish to your windows. Very much on trend, the mercury grey blind will bring a touch of luxury to your home at a fraction of the cost compared to high street prices.

products.title: Malta Silver Grey Roman Blind
products.description: A feel for velvet at a fraction of the cost. The malta collection comes in a variety of greys and natural colourways, perfect for todays interiors. The silver-grey colour is perfect for the contemporary home or mix it up with curtains for a more traditional look. Pleasing to the eye, and great to touch the malta range adds a touch of class to your home interior. All of their roman blinds are made here in their own west yorkshire factory by their skilled workforce.

Still, at the forefront of fashion, this fabric makes sumptuous roman blinds and curtains to enhance your home interior. products.description: Chic and on trend for today's living, the new grey faux suede blind will enhance your room interior.
